message:
'Shattered Harmony'

Cars fraught in tragic ballet,
Life's harsh drama took the stage.
Their melody, forever stilled,
In silence of the wreckage laid.

Life's harsh drama took the stage,
Two hearts no more to beat,
In silence of the wreckage laid,
A cautionary tale complete.

Two hearts no more to beat,
Their melody, forever stilled,
A cautionary tale complete,
Cars fraught in tragic ballet.
prompt: Two die in collision involving police vehicle in Shropshire Two people have died and two others sustained injuries after a crash involving a police vehicle in Shropshire. A man in his 60s who was driving a Skoda Octavia and a woman passenger in her 50s died at the scene in Morville Heath on Saturday, West Mercia police said.
